name: Kaleidoskop: fragmented futures
description:
With the appearance of a mysterious mutagen,
deforming all organic matter that comes into contact with it,
humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. 

Scrambling to preserve life as we know it,
an elite task force is formed,
genetically modified to withstand exposure.

...But everything comes at a price.

How much more are we willing to lose- in our pursuit of answers?

Attention! 
This game is in early development stages and vastly unfinished.
  All assets are subject to change.

The NaNoRenO concept demo is currently available.
